OOC: If Astroblast cannot take Condor (flying away with him/her) 
because of it was an accidental mode, then I will repost, and my 
apologies.

After Menasor had put the bot inside, Astroblast gave him final 
orders, "MENASOR, grab that other bot (Firearm), before he 
regains his balance and fly back to base. If the bot struggles, make 
sure he can't any more (not destroy, just disable) and NO 
FAILURES." Satisfied that Menasor should understand enough, 
Astroblast, with Triggerhappy and the other bot (Condor) inside of 
him, leaves for the Stunticons temporary base.

On 21 Feb 2001, at 21:08, Robert Dahl wrote:

> Menasor puts his free hand to his face and rubs his eyes. He then notices
> Astroblast and forces his hand towards Astroblast, with Condor in it, he
> hands Condor to Triggerhappy. "Menasor rules" he shouts out loud.
> "Decepticons RULE"
>
